scripts.build-sass-prod: rm -rf dist/css && node-sass assets/sass -o dist/css/ --output-style compressed
scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-images && npm run build-fonts && npm run build-js
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-sass-prod && npm run build-images && npm run build-fonts && npm run build-js-prod
scripts.watch: npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-images & npm run watch-fonts & npm run watch-js
scripts.bw: npm run build && npm run watch
